You have a set of needles. For the cravings.

  • When you Secure an Advantage by injecting yourself with some of the stuff,the choices on a hit instead become:
    • Take +3 momentum
    • Gain +2 on your next move (not a progress move).
  • When you Make a Connection by sharing some of your stuff with someone else, it’s always a weak hit.
  • When you Strike by injecting the stuff in a being with arcana running wild through their veins, don’t roll. Instead Mark Progress twice and Pay the Price. Envision how the stuff interacts with their arcane essence to make them terrifying.
